abstract: NBA Roundup; Minnesota Timberwolves defeat Brooklyn Nets, 132-118; other basketball scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Karl-Anthony Towns had 28 points, 7 assists and 6 rebounds and the Minnesota Timberwolves shot a franchise-record 68.4 percent to beat the visiting Nets, 132-118, on Saturday night.
snippet: Karl-Anthony Towns had 28 points, 7 assists and 6 rebounds and the Minnesota Timberwolves shot a franchise-record 68.4 percent to beat the visiting Nets, 132-118, on Saturday night.
